job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Human Capital is a venture firm for engineers. We believe great engineers build great companies, and we invest in founders and startups that share that mindset. In the last 5 years, that mantra has led us to invest in 10 companies before they became unicorns, including Snowflake, Anduril, Livongo, and Brex (where we wrote the first check). We have over $500M AUM and we've built a network of over 5,000 incredible, driven, ambitious engineers.Now we're looking for fullstack engineers to help us build our next chapter.THE ROLEYou’ll join a team of ~5, and partner across the company to build products and systems to maximize impact for our community: engineers, portfolio companies and investors. You’ll report to our Head of Engineering, and have a tangible impact on our culture and business. If you’re passionate about people, entrepreneurship, venture, and tech, we’d love to talk. YOUR PASTIdeally 2+ years of industry experienceExperience building and scaling web apps to broad audiencesKnowledge of databases, APIs, and foundation in data scienceComfortable with cloud technologies and continuous deploymentFull stack mentality - comfortable with frontend or backendParticipated in projects with technical and nontechnical stakeholdersEnjoy a fast-paced startup environment YOUR MINDSETYou thrive in ambiguity and can get going without a specYou enjoy working directly with end usersYou’re scrappy and have an entrepreneurial mindsetYou’re data-driven in your decision makingYou’re eager to make products that can impact the trajectory of early startupsYou love learning about venture capital, finance, and emerging tech companies
